Question
========

I want to add a plot created using ggplot to a Word document. Which 
command would I use after creating the plot.

Answerlist
----------

* `ggsave(file = 'fig1.png', width=4, height=4, dpi = 72)`
* `ggsave(file = 'fig1.pdf', width=4, height=4)`
* `ggsave(file = 'fig1.png', width=4, height=4, res=600)`

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* FALSE
* FALSE
* TRUE
